snippet.title: Soul Drifter Teaser
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2553930/Soul_Drifter/

Emerge in this gravity-defying parkour adventure, in which you play as a fallen soul on its mission to save others from evil machines.

All footage is captured in-game. The footage is from a pre-alpha state and may change in the future.
